name: FloatingWindowSize
shortdesc: The size of the movie's floating window. Valid only when floating window is true.

property.name: ONE_FIFTH
property.shortdesc: The floating window is one fifth the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: ONE_FOURTH
property.shortdesc: The floating window is one fourth the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: ONE_HALF
property.shortdesc: The floating window is one half the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: FULL
property.shortdesc: The floating window is the movie's original display size.

property.name: TWICE
property.shortdesc: The floating window is twice the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: TRIPLE
property.shortdesc: The floating window is triple the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: QUADRUPLE
property.shortdesc: The floating window is quadruple the length and height of the movie's original display size.

property.name: MAX
property.shortdesc: The floating window fills the entire screen.
